content: **sizes ** birth to 3 months sole measures 3½ long **materials ** 1 ball of bedspread cotton white only or coats and clark knit-cro sheen white and colors for bootie 1 ball coats and clark pearl cotton #5 in contrasting color for trim steel crochet hook #5 or english hook # 2 1/2 or size that will give you the correct gauge **gauge ** 9 double_crochet = 1 inch the instructions for this pattern reference another pattern called french knot booties this pattern can be found here 1 it should be noted that this pattern was originally shared in an e-mail listserv listserver@alexr demon co uk 1 http //web archive org/web/20060614165054/http //www steffosborne com/knit/c-boot2 txt
